meta.title: FitLime - Personalized Meal & Training Plans
meta.description: Complete personalized meal and training plans. Healthy lifestyle, diverse meals, education, and sports support.

cookies.text: We use cookies for proper website functionality and analytics. Learn more.

hero.title: Personalized meal & training plan in minutes
hero.lead: Fill out a short questionnaire and get a plan tailored to your needs.
hero.note: Non-binding, it only takes a few minutes.

why.title: FitLime - more than just a meal plan.
why.subtitle: We create personalized plans that turn everyday eating into a long-term, healthy, and sustainable lifestyle.

lifestyle.title: Healthy lifestyle
lifestyle.point1: Education and a long-term approach to health

nutrition.title: Nutrition tailored
nutrition.point1: Unique and varied meals every day

practical.title: Practical approach
practical.point1: Clear meal plan, recipes, and list
practical.point2: Support for sport, recovery, and performance
practical.point3: Easy adherence thanks to a smart system

how.title: How it works
how.subtitle: Creating a meal plan is simple and fast. We just need a few basic details about you and your goals. Based on them, we will generate a personalized meal plan within a few minutes.

step1.title: Questionnaire
step1.text: Fill in a few simple questions about yourself, your lifestyle, and your meal preferences. It helps us understand your goals, favorite foods, possible restrictions, and what style of eating suits you long term.

step2.title: Calculation
step2.text: Based on your data we create a personalized meal plan using a smart algorithm that selects the ideal combination of foods and adjusts the whole plan to your goals, tastes, and lifestyle.

step3.title: Delivery
step3.text: After ordering, you will receive a confirmation email. A clearly structured plan with recipes, exact portions, and practical recommendations is delivered within 2 business days for Premium and 3 days for Standard.

step4.title: Results
step4.text: Follow the plan and watch how your body, energy, and overall feeling change over time. Every day is a small step that brings you closer to healthier habits, better fitness, and greater satisfaction.

preview.title: Sports meal plan preview
preview.lead: The purchased plan includes a detailed PDF delivered after completion. This document guides you through the plan and offers clear instructions on how to use it. It contains these main parts:

tags.tag0: 1) Intro overview explaining how to use the plan
tags.tag1: 2) Charts of intake vs. expenditure including the training plan
tags.tag2: 3) Meal plan tailored to your parameters (sample of 1 day only)
tags.tag3: 4) Complete nutritional overview of all tracked nutrients
tags.tag4: 5) Smart shopping list with links to Rohlik.cz
tags.tag5: 6) Recipes and recommendations on how to work with the plan correctly

diet.title: Try building the ideal lunch
diet.subtitle: Pick individual foods and see how the overall nutrition changes as you build your lunch. The shown values are normalized for better illustration and comparison of healthier and less healthy options.

chart.noSelection: Check at least one item to display the chart

diet.algorithm: This simulator shows a simple principle of how our program works. In reality, the process is much more complex. We work with a much broader range of foods and meals while optimizing dozens of different nutrients (see "What the meal plan covers").

stat1.title: 300+ verified meals
stat1.text: We optimize a broad recipe database for every plan.

stat2.title: 25+ tracked parameters
stat2.text: We evaluate each meal by many parameters.

diet.bottomNote: Other factors also enter the final meal plan - correct portions, variety, logical ordering of meals during the day, and their balance across the week.

coverage.title: What the meal plan covers
coverage.intro: A complete overview of all key nutrients and food groups:

energy.title: Energy and macronutrients
energy.subtitle: The basic building blocks of a balanced meal plan.

groups.title: Food groups
groups.subtitle: Core food groups for healthy nutrition.

items.fish: Fish - source of protein and omega-3 fatty acids

fats.title: Types of fats
fats.subtitle: Different types of fat and their roles in nutrition.

items.poly: Polyunsaturated fats - omega-3 and omega-6 fatty acids

vitamins_b.title: B-complex vitamins
vitamins_b.subtitle: Key vitamins for energy, nerves, and metabolism.

items.vitb12: Vit. B12 - circulation, nervous system, and energy

vitamins.title: Other vitamins
vitamins.subtitle: Support for immunity, vitality, antioxidants, and cell growth.

minerals.title: Minerals
minerals.subtitle: Essential elements for a healthy body and proper muscle function.

audience.title: Who the meal plan is for
audience.lead: We tailor the healthy meal plan to how you live - whether you train for races, just exercise occasionally, or want to eat better and have more energy.

pro.title: Elite athletes
pro.text: Do you have a training plan, season, or races? We tune the meal plan to daily load so it matches performance, recovery, and body weight.

hobby.title: Active lifestyle
hobby.text: Do you run, go to the gym, cycle, or take classes and want to feel lighter, stronger, and have more energy? The meal plan fits into work, school, and family life.

everyday.title: Everyday life
everyday.text: Not a "sporty type" but want to eat healthier, have energy during the day, or lose weight? We build a meal plan that is realistic and sustainable long term.

audience.cta: Find out which plan suits you

q1.q: How will I receive my meal plan?
q1.a: We'll send it to your email as a PDF file including clear tables and charts.

q2.a: No, recipes are based on commonly available supermarket ingredients.

q3.q: How long does the plan last?
q3.a: We typically create a 7-day plan with 35 unique meals - you can reuse or modify it as needed.

q4.a: Yes, you'll receive a clear shopping list for the entire week.

q5.q: What if I don't have kitchen scales?
q5.a: Portions are listed, but approximate measures (spoon, cup, pieces) are fine. Focus on variety and balance rather than precision.

q6.q: Can you adjust for allergies or intolerances?
q6.a: Yes - just specify your preferences and restrictions in the form.

q7.q: Can you tailor the plan to my goals?
q7.a: Of course - whether it's weight loss, muscle gain, or maintenance.

q8.q: What if I have a medical condition?
q8.a: We can adapt the plan for special needs (e.g., high cholesterol, diabetes) - with expert consultation if necessary.

q9.a: They are designed by nutrition experts with experience in sports medicine.

q10.q: Where do you get nutritional data?
q10.a: We use verified food databases and our own computational models.

q11.q: What if I dislike a recipe?
q11.a: The plan includes multiple options, so you can always choose your favorite. The Premium plan also allows food exclusions.

q12.q: Can I update my plan later?
q12.a: Yes, monthly plans can be adjusted based on your feedback.

q13.q: How fast will I receive it?
q13.a: We deliver within 3 business days, usually within 1 day.

q14.a: Yes, we can create plans for people with minimal or no physical activity.

libor.name: Prof. MUDr. Libor Vítek, PhD, MBA
libor.item1: Clinical biochemist, internal medicine specialist at VFN and 1st Faculty of Medicine, Charles University
libor.item3: Collaboration with the Czech Olympic Team

danny.name: Ing. Daniel Vítek
danny.item1: Graduate in Bioinformatics at CTU FEE
danny.item2: Studies at the Faculty of Physical Education and Sport (Madrid)

cta.lead: Start the questionnaire and see how your personalized plan could look.
cta.note: You choose during checkout. It only takes a few minutes.

common.error_macro_sum: The sum of carbs, protein, and fat must equal 100%.

intro.title: Start your journey to better nutrition
intro.point1: Discover your needs - quick calculation of energy and goals.
intro.point2: Get your plan - recommended meals and activities.

step1.title: Basic information
step1.info_text: We need this information to calculate your basal metabolism and estimate your daily energy expenditure. Based on it, we'll create a meal plan suited to your goals.

step2.title: Goal & Energy
step2.help_lose: We recommend a mild caloric deficit.
step2.help_gain: A slight caloric surplus supports growth.
step2.bmr_help_kj: Calculated from profile (kJ/day). You can adjust manually.
step2.bmr_help_kcal: Calculated from profile (kcal/day). You can adjust manually.
step2.target_explainer: Select whether you want to lose, maintain, or gain weight. The intake recommendation will adjust automatically.
step2.bmr_explainer: BMR is the amount of energy your body burns at rest. You can modify it if you know a more accurate value.

step3.title: Sports activity
step3.help_activity_level: Choose whether you regularly play sports - we will adapt the meal plan accordingly.
step3.help_none: Regular walking and everyday movement, without regular workouts.
step3.help_sport: I train regularly and want the meal plan to reflect my activity.
step3.help_own_block: Enter details about your sport - how often you train, duration, and intensity.
step3.help_main_sport: Select the sport you do most often.
step3.help_need_sports: Select the sports you want in your plan.
step3.level_explainer: Select how often you exercise. This will adjust the required details.
step3.error_select_sport: Please choose a sport from the list.
step3.error_sessions_total: The total number of workouts per week must be at most 18.
step3.add_own_block_limit_hint: You have reached the maximum number of sports.
step3.error_future_max3: You can select a maximum of 3 sports.

step4.title: Diet preferences
step4.help_dislikes: Select ingredients you want to exclude from your plan.
step4.premium_note: Diet adjustments and exclusions are available only in the Premium plan.
step4.help_repeats: Select how often meals can repeat during the week.
step4.hint1: Most varied - meals do not repeat.
step4.hint2: Balanced - some meals repeat, still quite varied.
step4.hint3: Less variety, but easier to prepare.

step5.title: Macros & charts
step5.subtitle: Values are prefilled based on your activities.
step5.help_macros: Values are pre-filled based on your activity level.
step5.premium_note: Macro customization applies only to the Premium plan.

step6.title: Choose your plan
step6.period_help: Choose whether you want a one-time plan or a monthly subscription.
step6.help_week: We'll create one plan for you.
step6.standard_desc: Full meal plan for the working week.
step6.premium_desc: Complete weekly plan with extra features.
step6.standard_warning_title: Changes will not apply in the Standard plan
step6.standard_warning_text: In the Standard plan, your own diet, meal choices, and macro adjustments are not saved. Do you still want to continue?

step7.title: Summary & purchase
step7.name: Name
step7.terms: I agree with the Terms & Conditions
step7.privacy: I agree with the Privacy Policy
step7.missing_fields: Please fill in your name, email, and required consents.
step7.purchase_failed: The order could not be completed. Please try again.

payment_failed.message: Unfortunately, the payment could not be processed.

tips: Check that your card is enabled for online payments and has sufficient funds.
Try the payment again later or from another device/browser.
If it still fails, write to us and we will finalize the order manually.
payment_failed.support: If the payment keeps failing, contact us at {{email}} and we'll complete the order manually.

termsPage.subtitle: For providing a one-time custom meal plan
termsPage.title: Terms & Conditions - FitLime
termsPage.provider: Sportvital-Pro s.r.o., Mokropeská 1799, 252 28 Černošice, ID: 04528930, info@fitlime.cz

intro.title: 1. Introductory Provisions
intro.item1: These Terms govern the rights and obligations between the Provider and the Customer.
intro.item2: By submitting an order, the Customer confirms they have read and agree to these Terms.

service.title: 2. Nature of the Service
service.item1: The Provider offers a one-time personalized service - creating an individual weekly meal plan based on the Customer's data.
service.includes4: sending the meal plan to the Customer's e-mail.
service.item4: The meal plan is created solely from the data provided by the Customer; the Customer is responsible for its truthfulness and completeness.

order.title: 3. Order and Contract Formation
order.item1: The order is concluded by completing the form and paying the price.
order.item2: The contract is formed once payment is confirmed through the ComGate payment gateway.
order.item3: The Provider confirms the order by e-mail.

price.title: 4. Price and Payment Terms
price.item1: The service price is listed on the website and is final.
price.item2: Payment is made exclusively online via the ComGate Payments gateway.
price.item3: Work on the meal plan begins only after the price is paid.

delivery.title: 5. Service Delivery
delivery.item1: The Provider offers variants with different delivery times: Standard - within 3 business days, Premium - within 2 business days.
delivery.item2: The deadline begins once payment and complete data are received from the Customer.
delivery.item3: The meal plan is delivered by e-mail to the address provided by the Customer.
delivery.item4: If the e-mail ends up in spam/bulk/promo folders, it is considered delivered.
delivery.item5: If the Customer does not provide all required information, the delivery time is extended by the waiting time for the missing data.
delivery.item6: The Provider may slightly extend the deadline (technical issues, illness, force majeure) and will inform the Customer by e-mail.

recommend.title: 6. Advisory Nature of the Meal Plan
recommend.item1: All information, recommendations, and parts of the meal plan are general and advisory.
recommend.item2: The meal plan serves as a sample the Customer may draw inspiration from.
recommend.list2: their current physical and health condition,
recommend.item4: If any part of the meal plan or hydration guidance is unsuitable, the Customer follows their own needs.

health.title: 7. Health Limitations and Liability Disclaimer
health.item1: The Provider is not a healthcare facility and does not provide medical services.
health.item2: The meal plan is not diagnosis, treatment, or diet therapy.
health.item3: The Provider is not liable for:
health.list1: health consequences caused by improper use of the meal plan,
health.list2: consequences arising from untrue data provided by the Customer,
health.list4: changes in health status while following the meal plan.

results.title: 8. No Guarantee of Results
results.lead: The Customer acknowledges that the Provider does not guarantee any specific outcome.
results.note: Results depend on many factors (health condition, hormones, genetics, physical activity, adherence to the plan, environment, stress, sleep, medication).

withdrawal.title: 9. Withdrawal from the Contract
withdrawal.item1: The Customer acknowledges that under Section 1837(d) of the Civil Code they cannot withdraw, as the service is tailored to their individual requirements.
withdrawal.item2: Once the Provider starts working on the meal plan, the right to withdraw expires.

claims.title: 10. Complaints and Refunds
claims.lead: A complaint is only possible in these cases:
claims.item1: The meal plan could not be created for objective professional reasons.
claims.item2: The Provider does not deliver the meal plan within the guaranteed timeframe for the selected service variant, and the delay is not caused by the Customer or spam delivery.
claims.item3: In cases 1 or 2, the Customer is entitled to a full refund.
claims.note: Other complaints are not possible because this is a bespoke service.

copyright.title: 11. Copyright
copyright.item1: The meal plan is the Provider's copyrighted work.
copyright.item2: It is intended only for the Customer's personal use.
copyright.item3: Sharing, publishing, selling, or modifying the meal plan is prohibited.

privacy.title: 12. Personal Data Protection
privacy.item1: Personal data processing follows the Privacy Policy available on the FitLime website.

final.title: 14. Final Provisions
final.item1: The Provider may update these Terms at any time.
final.item2: The current version is always available on the FitLime website.
final.item3: Legal relations are governed by the laws of the Czech Republic.

controller.title: 1. Data Controller
controller.domains: The Controller operates FitLime projects on domains fitlime.cz, fitlime.sk, fitlime.eu.

data.title: 2. What personal data we process
data.directTitle: A) Data provided directly by the user
data.directItem8: optional health or restriction data (allergies, intolerances, health condition)
data.directNote: Note: Health data are a special category of personal data - we process them only with consent, as they are necessary to create a tailored meal plan.
data.orderItem4: information from the ComGate payment gateway
data.comgateTitle: C) Data from the ComGate payment gateway
data.comgateNote: We receive these data without card details.
data.webTitle: D) Data created by using the website
data.webItem3: analytics data (Google Analytics, optionally Meta Pixel)

purposes.title: 3. Purposes and legal bases
purposes.p1Desc: Creating a personalized meal plan, communication, evaluating data. Legal basis: contract performance (Art. 6(1)(b) GDPR).
purposes.p2Desc: Health status, allergies, height, weight, BMI, age - necessary to personalize the plan. Legal basis: explicit consent (Art. 9(2)(a) GDPR).
purposes.p3Desc: Processing payments, order confirmation, invoice records. Legal basis: contract performance + legal obligation.
purposes.p4Desc: Sending news and tips, special offers. Legal basis: consent.
purposes.p5Desc: Measuring traffic, error detection, protection against attacks. Legal basis: legitimate interest of the Controller.

retention.title: 4. Data retention periods
retention.service: Service provision data - 3 years after the last order.
retention.health: Health data (meal plan) - until consent is withdrawn or max. 1 year after service completion.
retention.invoices: Invoices and accounting records - 10 years as required by law.
retention.marketing: Marketing - until unsubscribe / max. 3 years from the last e-mail open.
retention.comgate: ComGate payment data - according to their internal rules (usually 3-5 years).

recipients.title: 5. Recipients of personal data
recipients.lead: Your personal data may be shared with:
recipients.item6: Meta Platforms (if marketing pixel tracking is used)
recipients.note: All processors comply with GDPR requirements.

cookies.title: 6. Cookies
cookies.note: A cookie banner with options is shown on first visit.

rights.title: 7. User rights
rights.complaint: You can lodge a complaint with the Czech Data Protection Authority, www.uoou.cz.

final.title: 9. Final provisions
final.item2: The current version is always published on the FitLime website.

hero.title: Cookies
hero.lead: We use cookies on FitLime so the site works correctly, stays secure, and we can keep improving it. Below is a summary of the cookie types, why we use them, and how to manage your consent.

how.title: How cookies work
how.text: Cookies are small text files saved in your browser. They let the site remember basic settings so everything runs smoothly and securely.
how.li1: Keep language, form content, and other essential choices.
how.li2: Help maintain secure operation and protect against abuse.
how.li3: Optionally collect anonymized traffic data to improve the site.

types.title: Which types we use
types.essential: Essential - power the site (language choice, form state). They cannot be turned off because the site would not work.
types.analytics: Analytics - anonymous measurement of traffic and performance. Enabled only after your consent.
types.marketing: Marketing - personalization and third-party campaigns. Used only if you explicitly allow them.

manage.title: How to change or withdraw consent
manage.step1: On the homepage, a banner appears on first visit so you can accept or decline optional cookies.
manage.step2: You can reset your choice anytime via the button below or by clearing cookies in your browser.
manage.step3: Technical cookies stay active so the site can run and show you the consent banner again.
manage.resetHint: Removes your previous consent in this browser and will show the cookie banner on your next visit.
manage.resetAlert: Cookie settings were cleared. After returning to the homepage, the consent banner will appear again.
